channel.title: Linux server hosting
channel.description:
I recently changed my windows laptop to Linux (Ubuntu YAY!) and I wish to run my server on it. I followed the tutorial by Fat Cookies (I think?) and it all went well until I had to run the server. I made run.sh (the shell version of my run.bat file) and I tried putting chmod -x run into terminal but it says it cannot find the file or directory.
Any help is appreciated, maybe even repped if I think that it is deserved
Durial12
